snippet.title: City of the Shroud Multiplayer Battle (Victory; Ver. 0.0.7)
snippet.description:
Back us on Kickstarter, launching February 2! http://www.abyssalarts.com/kickstarter

And vote for us on Steam Greenlight! http://www.abyssalarts.com/greenlight

A full multiplayer battle between City of the Shroud's lead designer and producer in version 0.0.7.This video is from the winner's point of view. Spoiler: the designer always wins.

Download the prototype: http://abyssal-arts.itch.io/city-of-t...

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/abyssalarts
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/abyssalarts
Website: http://www.abyssalarts.com
